channel.title: ordinary chondrite – Solar Anamnesis
channel.description: Scenes from the Solar System's Youth

item.title: Aba Panu Meteorite Thin Section
item.dc:creator: solaranamnesis
item.description: The Aba Panu Meteorite thin section in cross polarized light. Check back later for animated gif comparing the original fragment as seen here: Aba Panu Meteorite Surface image. Full Screen Meteorite Thin Section Panoramas: View on Gigapan | View with krpano Click to Load Purchase Prints Visit Store

item.title: NWA 10669 Meteorite Thin Section
item.dc:creator: solaranamnesis
item.description: This thin section of the NWA 10669 meteorite spans the entire breadth of my scope’s aperture, making it just a little over 30 millimeters. Thanks to its enormity there is much to look at and explore. Full Screen Meteorite Thin Section Panoramas: View on Gigapan | View with krpano Click to Load Purchase Prints Visit […]

item.title: Aba Panu Meteorite Surface
item.dc:creator: solaranamnesis
item.description: Object fell over Aba Panu, Nigeria on April 19, 2018. The Aba Panu meteorite has a recovered mass of 160 kilograms. Shown here are many interesting chondrules in a wide range of sizes. Full Screen Meteorite Thin Section Panoramas: View on Gigapan | View with krpano Click to Load Purchase Prints Visit Store

item.title: NWA 3189 Meteorite Thin Section
item.dc:creator: solaranamnesis
item.description: Good looking thin section of the NWA 3189 meteorite in cross-polarized light. Lots of chondrules with several distinct barred ones. Additional pictures at Meteorite Thin Section Gallery Full Screen Meteorite Thin Section Panoramas: View on Gigapan | View with krpano Click to Load Purchase Prints Visit Store

item.title: NWA 11038 Meteorite Thin Section
item.dc:creator: solaranamnesis
item.description: NWA 11038 is a decent meteorite and nice example of an L3 chondrite. There are some pretty blue inclusions along with distinct chondrules. View Meteorite Thin Section Panoramas: View on Gigapan | View with krpano Click to Load Purchase Prints Visit Store
